mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.name as t_name, t.start_time as t_start_time, t.end_time as t_end_time, t.scr_state as t_scr_state
mapper.insert:
insert into screening
id,
code,
name,
start_time,
end_time,
scr_state,

end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scr_state = #{scrState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
